name: Game Data APIs
title: Game Data APIs - US
description:
Endpoints for Hearthstone cards, decks, and related information. For various tips on searching and other questions about the Hearthstone API, see the [Hearthstone Guide](/documentation/guides/game-data-apis-hearthstone-guide).

**Hosts**: note that Blizzard API request paths follow this format: `{region}.api.blizzard.com/{API path}`. For more information, see the [Getting Started guide](/documentation/guides/getting-started).

Card search.description: Returns an up-to-date list of all cards matching the search criteria. For more information about the search parameters, see the [Hearthstone Guide](/documentation/guides/game-data-apis-hearthstone-guide).

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data. If you do not supply a value, all translations are returned.

set.description: The slug of the set the card belongs to. If you do not supply a value, cards from all sets will be returned.

class.description: The slug of the card's class.

manaCost.description: The mana cost required to play the card. You can include multiple values in a comma-separated list of numeric values.

attack.description: The attack power of the minion or weapon. You can include multiple values in a comma-separated list of numeric values.

health.description: The health of a minion. You can include multiple values in a comma-separated list of numeric values.

collectible.description: Whether a card is collectible. A value of 1 indicates that collectible cards should be returned; 0 indicates uncollectible cards. To return all cards, use a value of '0,1'.

rarity.description: The rarity of a card. This value must match the rarity slugs found in metadata.

type.description: The type of card (for example, minion, spell, and so on). This value must match the type slugs found in metadata.

minionType.description: The type of minion card (for example, beast, murloc, dragon, and so on). This value must match the minion type slugs found in metadata.

keyword.description: A required keyword on the card (for example, battlecry, deathrattle, and so on). This value must match the keyword slugs found in metadata.

textFilter.description: A text string used to filter cards. You must include a locale along with the textFilter parameter.

pageSize.description: The number of results to choose per page. A value will be selected automatically if you do not supply a pageSize or if the pageSize is higher than the maximum allowed.

sort.description: The field used to sort the results. Valid values include manaCost, attack, health, and name. Results are sorted by manaCost by default. Cards will also be sorted by class automatically in most cases.

order.description: The order in which to sort the results. Valid values are asc or desc. The default value is asc.

Fetch one card.description: Returns the card with an ID or slug that matches the one you specify. For more information, see the [Hearthstone Guide](/documentation/guides/game-data-apis-hearthstone-guide).

:idorslug.description: An ID or slug that uniquedly identifies a card. You can discover these values by using the `GET /hearthstone/cards` endpoint.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Fetch deck.description: Finds a deck by its deck code. For more information, see the [Hearthstone Guide](/documentation/guides/game-data-apis-hearthstone-guide).

:deckcode.description: A code that identifies a deck. You can copy one from the game or various Hearthstone websites.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

All metadata.description: Returns information about the categorization of cards. Metadata includes the card set, set group (for example, Standard or Year of the Dragon), rarity, class, card type, minion type, and keywords. For more information, see the [Hearthstone Guide](/documentation/guides/game-data-apis-hearthstone-guide).

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Specific metadata.description: Returns information about just one type of metadata. For more information, see the [Hearthstone Guide](/documentation/guides/game-data-apis-hearthstone-guide).

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

:type.description: The type of the metadata to retrieve. Valid values include sets, setGroups, types, rarities, classes, minionTypes, and keywords.
